A big Thank you to the open Source Creators that supplied some of the textures i used..!
You guys are the backbone of Open-Source and make the world a better place, one texture at a time :)

Also... A big shout out to the guys from tinypng.com.
Thank you for helping me reduce the weight of my page.

If you want to use the rocket model I made in blender,
you can take it from the project on my gitHub or go to:
https://www.cgtrader.com/free-3d-models/aircraft/other/toy-rocket-white-and-red

Same goes for the arrow model:
https://www.cgtrader.com/free-3d-models/various/various-models/green-arrow-0ae27a74-1bc1-4f0d-a5e8-ff5b54f37a4b

Moon / Jupiter Textures:
Solar System Scope
https://www.solarsystemscope.com/textures/
Attribution 4.0 License

Fire Particle Image:
Emil Persson, aka Humus
http://www.humus.name
Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported License

Linkedin Logo:
